newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dynamic Healthcare upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dynamic Healthcare upgraded.

text.p: -- Vector Securities International Inc said Friday it upgraded Dynamic Healthcare Technologies Inc to a focus buy based on accretion from its recent acquisition of Collaborative Medical Systems Inc.
-- Vector analyst Benjamin Rooks said the acquisition is a "great strategic fit... which positions Dynamic for the next level of (health care information systems) companies."

-- Rooks said Dynamic Healthcare will post a loss in the fourth quarter because of an $11-million one-time charge related to the acquisition. However, he believes the company will be profitable in the quarter on an operating basis.
-- Rooks also raised his estimate for Dynamic Healthcare's fiscal 1997 earnings to $0.38 per share from $0.27.
-- Dynamic Healthcare develops computer systems for the health care industry.
-- The company's shares were down 3/16 Friday at 5-1/4.
